questions.question: Wenk: Maak seker jy het 'n groot serp en 'n bottel asyn (week serp in asyn indien polisie gebruik maak van traangas)
Was daar enige verwante protesoptredes in die verlede (hoeveel, wanneer en waar) en is enige iets bereik?
Hoe het die owerhede en die polisie reageer op die protes?
Het polisie enige nie-dodelike (traangas, rubber koeÃ«ls) of dodelike wapens (lewendige ammunisie) gebruik, of albei?
Is enigiemand beseer? Wie, hoeveel en hoe erg?
Na watter hospitale/ klinieke is die beseerdes geneem vir behandeling?
Indien daar gerugte van polisiegeweld is, het jy bewyse en het jy 'n reaksie van die polisie hieroor?
Wat is die huidige stand van die protes?
Watter soort protes is dit?
Wie is die hooforganiseerders van die protes?
questions.description: Kry hul amptelike titel, organisasie en kontakbesonderhede.

questions.question: Was die protesoptrede beplan of onbeplan?
Wat is die oorsaak van die protes?
Is nie-regeringsorganisasies of politieke partye betrokke by die protesoptrede?
questions.description: Kry hul name, organisasie, kontakbesonderhede en rede vir betrokkenheid.

questions.question: Hoe groot is die skare:
questions.description: moenie raai nie! Bevestig met organiseerders en polisie.

questions.question: Haal een van die organiseerders woordeliks aan oor die optrede
Voer onderhoude met ten minste 10 betogers:
questions.description: kry hul naam, ouderdom, waar hulle woon, waarom hulle protesteer, wat hulle wil bereik?

questions.question: Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
Tip: Ensure you have a large scarf and a bottle of vinegar (soak scarf in vinegar if police use teargas) in case there is teargas?
Have there been any related protests in the past (how many, when and where) and was anything achieved?
How did the authorities and police respond to the protest?
Did police use any non-lethal force (teargas, rubber bullets) or lethal force (live ammunition), or both?
Was anyone injured? Who, how many and how badly?
To which hospitals/clinics were the injured taken for treatment?
If there are reports of violent force from police, do you have evidence and do you have a response from the police about this?
What is the current status of the protest?
What kind of protest is it? A march, a strike, a barricade?
Who are the main organisers of the protest?
questions.description: Get their official title, organisation and contact details.

questions.question: Was the protest planned or unplanned?
What is the reason for the protest?
Were any NGOs or political parties involved or related to the protest?
questions.description: Get their names, organisation, contact details and reason for involved.

questions.question: What is the size of the crowd:
questions.description: don't guess! Check with organisers and police.

questions.question: Get a quote from the organisers about the protest
Interview a minimum of 10 protesters:
questions.description: get their name, age, where they live, why they are protesting, what do they want to achieve?

questions.question: Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
